$:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/defaultShowText","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"View"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/history":{"caption":"History","created":"20140913085909578","creator":"EucalyJ","lastupdate":"20140913.6","modified":"20140913111506455","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_readme $:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!!!History * 20140913 / ''0.0.1'' ( 12.3K / 6.8K ) ** Implement a javascript `<>` macro ** `<>`, `<>`, `<>`, `<>` also availbale * 20140910 ** Raise a request to __dedect location through ~PageTemplate hierarchy__ at [[TiddlyWiki Forum|http://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tiddlywiki/yKLkIWf0lGQ]] ** Implement a javascript macro ''trace-variable.js'' to trace a variable through widget/transclude hierarchy. ** Hint by @Jermolene that the ''transclusion'' variable will help to trace transclude hierarchy "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/macros-render":{"created":"20140913075557300","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140913102929280","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/macros-render","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define beginRegEx() (beg|[(<])(?i) \define midRegEx() (mid|[|\/])(?i) \define endRegEx() (end|[)}>])(?i) \define ttme-render-link(text) <$link to="$(me)$"> <$transclude tiddler="$text$"> <$list filter="[[$text$]regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text1"> <$text text="$text$"/> <$list filter="[[$text$]!regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text2"> <$text text="$(me)$"/> \end \define ttme-render-button(text:"", message:"tm-navigate", tooltip:"", class:"-") <$button param="$(me)$" message="$message$" tooltip="$tooltip$" class="$class$"> <$transclude tiddler="$text$"> <$list filter="[[$text$]regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text1"> <$text text="$text$"/> <$list filter="[[$text$]!regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text2"> <$text text="$(me)$"/> \end \define ttme-render-full(editText:"", showText:"", beginText:"" endText:"", midText:"", class:"", order:"< edit / show >") <$list filter="$order$" variable="thisItem"> <$list filter="[regexp[show(?i)]first[]]" variable="text0"> <$list filter="[[$showText$]regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text1"> <> <$list filter="[[$showText$]!regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text2"> <> <$list filter="[regexp[edit(?i)]first[]]" variable="text0"> <$list filter="[[$editText$]regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text1"> <> <$list filter="[[$editText$]!regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text2"> <> <$list filter="[regexpfirst[]]" variable="text0"> <$text text="$beginText$"/> <$list filter="[regexpfirst[]]" variable="text0"> <$text text="$midText$"/> <$list filter="[regexpfirst[]]" variable="text0"> <$text text="$endText$"/> \end"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/macros":{"created":"20140913031711920","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140913081020618","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/tags/Macro $:/_macros $:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/macros","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define LinkMe(linkText:"") <$set name="me" value=<> > <$importvariables filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/macros-]]"> <> \end \define EditOrShowMe(editText:"", showText:"", beginText:"" midText:"", endText:"", class="$class$", order:"< edit / show >" mode:"link") <$importvariables filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/macros-]]"> <$set name="me" value=<> > <> \end \define ShowMe(text:"", beginText:"", endText:"", class:"") <">> \end \define EditMe(text:"", beginText:"", endText:"", class:"") <> \end"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/readme":{"caption":"~TitleMe","created":"20140913032347138","creator":"EucalyJ","example1":"<>","example2":"<>","example3":"<> and <>","example4":"<>","example5":"<>","lastupdate":"20140913.6","modified":"20140914032952899","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_readme $:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define example-code-table(src) <$list filter="example1 example2 example3 example4 example5" variable="field"> \end !!<>
TitleMe - Return in-place tiddler title, to link / show / edit the source tiddler !!!Features `**` All below macros help you to __access the "source tiddler"__ (even in transclude hierarchy, tabs, sidebar, or toolbar) # `<>` -- returns the title of source tiddler # `<>` -- links to the source tiddler # `<>` -- a button to show the source tiddler # `<>` -- a button to edit the source tiddler # `<>` -- trace a variable through widget/transclude hierarchy. !!!Install * Drag&Drop -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme]] (with documentation) !!!Uasge
Code Result

<$view tiddler="$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/readme" field=<>/>

 <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/readme" field=<> />
Syntax Parameters

`<>`
-- returns the title of source tiddler

 * no parameter needed

`<>`
-- links to the source tiddler

 * Default as tiddler title, if `text` is not specified

`<>`
-- a button to show the source tiddler

 * Default `text` defined in [[$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/defaultShowText]]. * Can also put image there, such as `{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}` * Surrounding text (`beginText` and `endText`) will disappear if this plugin is disabled. * `class` to specify the button CSS style, such as `tc-btn-invisible` or user defined style.

`<>`
-- a button to edit the source tiddler

 * Default `text` defined in [[$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/defaultEditText]]. * Others are similar to `<>`

`<>`

`<>`

 * If delimiter not specified, could be applied as filter in `<$list>` widget, see [[trace-variable Example]] <$text text="[[value of this]] [[value of parent widget]] ... [[value until root widget]]"/> * Will use `delimiter` if specified
* Example <> "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/titleme.js":{"created":"20140913021122630","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140913031054832","modifier":"EucalyJ","module-type":"macro","tags":"$:/_js $:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/titleme.js","type":"application/javascript","text":"/*\ $:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/titleme.js type: application/javascript module-type: macro !!! Feature This TitleMe macro returns the title of source tiddler (even in a transclude hierarchy) !!! Usage <> * returns the title of source tiddler \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; exports.name = "TitleMe"; exports.params = [ ]; /* Run the macro */ exports.run = function() { var output = "", variable_name = "transclusion", meRegex = /\{[^|]*\|([^|]*)\|/, p = this, v0 = ""; while (p) { var v = p.getVariable(variable_name); if ( v && v!=v0 ) { var match = meRegex.exec(v); if (match && match.length>1) { output = match[1]; break; } } p = p.parentWidget; } return output; }; })();"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/trace-variable.js":{"created":"20140910075050264","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140913024303804","modifier":"EucalyJ","module-type":"macro","tags":"$:/_js $:/_titleme","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/titleme/trace-variable.js","type":"application/javascript","text":"/*\ $:/macros/eucaly/trace-variable.js type: application/javascript module-type: macro !!! Feature This trace-variable macro trace the variable through widget/transclude hierarchy. Undefined and neighboring redundant values are dropped. !!! Usage <> <> !!! Return value * if delimiter not specified [[value of this]] [[value of parent widget]] ... [[value until root widget]] !!! Example <$text text=<>/> <$list filter=<>> {{!!title}} - {{!!tags}}
\*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; /* Information about this macro This is the mysamplemacro of Tiddly Wiki 5 written in JavaScript */ exports.name = "trace-variable"; exports.params = [ { name: "variable_name" }, { name: "delimiter" } ]; /* Run the macro */ exports.run = function(variable_name, delimiter) { var output = ""; var p = this; var v0 = ""; while (p) { var v = p.getVariable(variable_name); if ( v && v!=v0 ) { if (delimiter) { output = output + v + delimiter; } else { output = output + "[[" + v + "]] "; } v0 = v; } p = p.parentWidget; } return output; }; })();"}}}
